attributes.action: Please make it illegal to drive our children to school on buses with NO seatbelts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lives of our children are being gambled with by National and Local Government by exploiting law loop holes to allow transport companies, contracted to Schools, to allocate buses with no seat belt provision. Even although the E.U. directive advised all member states to have this rectified by 2006.
